a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: People living in countries in which a woman is head of government,
Heads of government are the chief officers of the executive branch of their countries.
Data source: OWID based on V-Dem (v13); Gapminder (v6); HYDE (v3.2); UN (2022)
Note: This is recorded on December 31 of each year. V-Dem covers many more countries since 1900.
